PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01612018-02-21,  PCH,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of JUDITH PEREIRA of Toronto, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 25, 2018, in the place of Erin Rankin Nash, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
